title: Fiora was reworked to pick on me personally...  I was too good at Fiora.
body:
I've had many accounts banned from trying to teach new players who don't want to learn.

There are allot of know it alls in this game.

Riot is a know it all. 

They think they know what's best for Fiora but they don't.

She was better the old way.

My opinion is irrelevant just like yours but,

I was banned from ranked the same time they nerfed Fiora (The Rework)

How was Fiora nerfed you say?
(It's not her damage)

1. They removed double lunge so no more level 1 pentakills
2. They destroyed her ultimate and made a plecebo ult.

You may say I just don't know how to use her.
I am good with both Fioras but I am bitter with the new one.
She's not AS good.

I was banned for getting 40 and 0 too much in bronze. 
Riot didn't like the fact that I couldn't leave bronze yet could get 40 and 0.
They think I'm trolling so they picked on me and nerfed my main and banned me from ranked.
Huh Riot?

That's what you did.

No not even the best Fiora who dominates all other champs with the old Fiora at least but maybe Zed or Tryn. Not even the best Fiora in all of leauges can leave bronze because it's all rage quitters and feeders.

My complaint is that I couldn't carry these teams with the old Fiora let alone the new one.

You've made it so I can no longer pentakill all 5 enemies while I solo guard the nexus with my ult.

If you have 4 bad teamates every game you play at least give me a champ I can still level the playing field with.

The new Fiora is nerfed.

I want it changed and I want an apology from Riot directly.

Riot isn't the only one who picks on me.

Everyone in here who wants to down vote me here in the forums is a bully too.

They don't care about Fiora.

Nobody cares about Fiora like I do.

They will vote for the new Fiora not because they like her better but just to be an ass to me.

Watch...

replies.body:
> My opinion is irrelevant

Well at least you got one thing right
She's gone.  You have to let go or else you'll be stuck in the past forever, and that is a miserable existence indeed.
NO.  I'm going to FIGHT FOR THE OLD FIORA NEARLY EVERY DAY LIKE I HAVE BEEN SINCE IT HAPPENED BECAUSE I AM THE ONLY ONE WHO LOVES HER!

The only thing you can do now is avenge her.  She's gone forever, and nothing you can do will change that.

Let her go.  Let her rest peacefully.  Let her memory be one you find comforting, rather than one that will sour and cause you bitterness for years to come.

> [{quoted}](name=redniwediS,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2EGvjFLY,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-11-22T22:19:25.638+0000)
>
> The only thing you can do now is avenge her.  She's gone forever, and nothing you can do will change that.
> 
> Let her go.  Let her rest peacefully.  Let her memory be one you find comforting, rather than one that will sour and cause you bitterness for years to come.

Sorry I'm not a defeatist like you!  I believe I have the power to change the WORLD!
You can change the world, but even you cannot raise the dead.
Riot can bring her back as "The Ghost of Fiora"
Don't lie to yourself.  You know the truth, and the sooner you accept it the sooner you can continue on your own path.

The truth...  That Riot is heartless and cares nothing about my feelings as a player or it's own game. That it would rather delete the issue or ban me than accept it's own diagnosis as a psychopath to the 1st E-sport.

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2EGvjFLY,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-11-22T22:16:25.702+0000)
>
> NO.  I'm going to FIGHT FOR THE OLD FIORA NEARLY EVERY DAY LIKE I HAVE BEEN SINCE IT HAPPENED BECAUSE I AM THE ONLY ONE WHO LOVES HER!

You're not the ONLY one. I'm sure there are people who like the old one better. To be honest, I like her better, too. Believe it or not, she felt fairer to play against. I miss Yorick...
Please go bother Reddit with your fucking nostalgic trolling.

Dude, think about Reddit!

Why should they suffer?

Because fuck Reddit. 

Bunch of Harambe loving wankers.

"Wankers"?
Don't go Brit on me fellow Yankee!
Apparently I have a British writing style based on a friend's observation.
I once looked up "circlejerk" and all i found was pictures of reddit. Not even joking
Haha. Brilliant.
Ofc i had safe search on so that's why i didn't find any real circlejerks, still a great roast tho.
Waiting on the day when Riot will ban you from the forums
They have already just to be mean like you guys.  But here I am again calling you all out!
If they banned you how are you here? Only permanent bans matter :P
If no one else has figured this out yet. This is infact, a satire post. Should be moved to memes and games.
Exactly what I was thinking...
I didn't lie about anything however...
It's funny how delusion works.
Where's the report option for "I genuinely think this person needs professional help"?
But I do like the new Fiora better...
Because you are a hater....   haters gonna hate.

But I'm not a hater...

I don't dislike the old Fiora at all, how could I?

I haven't played LoL long enough to experience old Fiora.
i love you these posts are so good

Finally... someone!
   I love you too!
he was sarcastic..
I don't think it was sarcastic, I think it was him thinking its a troll XD
Someone should make mail order bleach shots...
For me to drink?  How thoughtful of you...

Is this bait?

Smells like bait.
As the greatest Fiora of all time with 1000's of games literally I can tell you that everyone here is rather rude and isn't very considerate of Fiora's feelings.
There is only one polite and logical person in this forum.  Me.
Bronze 5, this is shitposting to the next level

> [{quoted}](name=XTRMN00B1337,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2EGvjFLY,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2016-11-22T23:00:29.028+0000)
>
> Bronze 5, this is shitposting to the next level

I got 40 and 0 too much...

I basically am the illuminated one.

How many times have you guys been banned from ranked? 
Doesn't happen very often...

 Ohhh isn't It Ironic it happens the exact same time Riot banned me from ranked.
JUST a coincidence!

> [{quoted}](name=FrozenHearts,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2EGvjFLY,comment-id=000900000000,timestamp=2016-11-23T00:00:23.476+0000)
>
> Take your head out of your ass if you think you're a special little pea in the pot.

The smaller you make me the smaller you make yourself.
move this to memes and games ull get upvotes
I am not sure if I should laugh WITH you for your joke, which is the entire post, or laugh AT you if you seriously meant every word you said above lol
Laughing at me was predictable. You all fell for my trap.

When all 4 of my new teammates are dead every game there is no champion I can hold the nexus with anymore.  I know it's a team game but...

    You are all bad at being teammates and I can no longer win without you.
Camille seems like your alley.
F3DORA.
